item.description:
URGENT UPDATE:

Due to the upcoming snow storm and after polling each of the
District Coordinators, the majority have agreed to postpone
this meeting until January 25, 2009. The time and location
will remain the same.


Our second state convention is set for the 11th of January starting at 12:00 noon and ending at 5:00 pm. We are currently in discussion on our Charter and Mission Statement. Part of the agenda will be to focus on this charter and move closer to its ratification.

Another topic on the agenda will be the duties and expectations of the District coordinators.
item.name: MassLPA Quarterly Convention
